Description:
Transform your browsing experience with Web Content Analyzer, the ultimate tool for fetching, filtering, and displaying web page content with ease. Whether you're conducting research, fact-checking, or simply seeking cleaner content, this extension simplifies the process, bringing the essential information directly to you.

Features:
Instant Content Fetching: Retrieve and display the text content of any web page without clutter.
Smart Filtering: Automatically remove extraneous links and only show the most relevant content.
User-Friendly Lightbox: View fetched content in a convenient, readable lightbox overlay.
Seamless Integration: Access the extensionâ€™s functionality directly from your context menu with a simple right-click.
Background Processing: Fetch content from new tabs without disrupting your browsing flow.
How It Works:
Right-Click: Select any link and choose "Fetch Content" from the context menu.
Background Fetching: The extension opens the link in the background, extracts the main content, and closes the tab automatically.
View Content: The filtered content is displayed in a lightbox on your current tab, allowing you to read without distractions.
Why Choose Web Content Analyzer?
Efficiency: Save time by getting straight to the content that matters.
Clarity: Reduce clutter by removing unnecessary links and extraneous elements.
Convenience: Enjoy a seamless, non-intrusive experience that fits into your workflow.
Upgrade your browsing today with Web Content Analyzer and experience a cleaner, more efficient way to access web content.
